parameters.name: AppName
parameters.description: Third-party application name whose keywords to get

parameters.name: AppNames
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of the third-party application names VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

parameters.name: NodeNames
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of the third-party application name's keywords VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported

parameters.name: NodeValues
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of the third-party application name's keyword values VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported

title: IModelDocExtension.IGetSearchData
description: Gets the SOLIDWORKS Search, third-party, application keywords from the model document.
signature:
void IGetSearchData( 
   System.String
AppName
,
   System.Int32
Count
,
   out System.String
AppNames
,
   out System.String
NodeNames
,
   out System.String
NodeValues
)

parameters.name: AppName
parameters.description: Third-party application name whose keywords to get

parameters.name: AppNames
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of the third-party application names VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

parameters.name: NodeNames
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of the third-party application name's keywords VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported

parameters.name: NodeValues
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of the third-party application name's keyword values VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported

returns: Number of third-party application name's keywords
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
IModelDocExtension::GetSearchDataCount
to get the value of Count.
